Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface AccessController

All Superinterfaces:
Composeable<AccessController>
public interface AccessController extends Composeable<AccessController>
Interface to adapt to for access decisions.
Author:
Pavel Vlasov

  • Method Details

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission(String action, String qualifier, Context context)
      Checks for a permission to perform an action for a given qualifier with a given context.
      Parameters:
      action - Action to perform. E.g. "read" or "execute", "transfer-funds".
      qualifier - Qualifier, e.g. "firstName" for read or "transferFunds" for execute.
      context - Context for context-conditional permissions, e.g. for execute transferFunds it may contain "amount" key with transfer amount as a value, or more generally a map of parameter names to argument values for EOperation.
      Returns:

    • hasPermission

      default boolean hasPermission(String action, String qualifier)
      Checks for a permission to perform an action for a given qualifier with empty context.
      Parameters:
      action -
      qualifier -
      Returns:

    • contextify

      default AccessController contextify(Context enclosingContext)
      Parameters:
      enclosingContext - Context to fall-back to.
      Returns:
      Access controller which chains the context passed to the hasPermission(action, qualifier, context) with the enclosing context passed to this method.

    • compose

      default AccessController compose(AccessController other)
      Composes with ``and()``.
      Specified by:
      compose in interface Composeable<AccessController>
      Returns:

    • and

      default AccessController and(AccessController other)
      Parameters:
      accessControllers -
      Returns:
      An "intersection" access controller which allows a permission only if all elements allow it. In the case of an empty list all permissions are denied.

    • or

      default AccessController or(AccessController other)
      Parameters:
      accessControllers -
      Returns:
      A "union" access controller which allows a permission if any of elements allows. In the case of an empty list all permissions are denied.
